resources.string:
(1) Notification: Create notification a message. You can pull down actionBar to set volume of music by click the volume button.

(2) Custom: Create a custom button to save the all kinds of audio types at present. And using long click to remove the button.

(3) According to different device, the setting of volume will be different. Some of device use the same control for rign tone and system. And when the ring tone was set to 0, the device will be become to vibration mode, so the volume of system will be set to 0.

Report related bug or better idea to my blog or e-mail, thanks for your help.

 Blog: 
 http://www.dotblogs.com.tw/kent2480/archive/2015/04/13/151039.aspx

 Mail:
 androidapkent@gmail.com
Please shorten the length of name(less than 10 char)
Only three custom buttons. You can long click old custom button to remove.
In vibration mode, the volume of system will be lock. You must to unlock vibration mode by step up ring tone.
Click Ok to removeã€€this custom button.
